name: In vitro (Magn)
description:
Space invaders in vitro. Shoot the viruses but not the cells. Watch out for infections! Bring balance to the force... whatever that means :)

Keys: I, J, K, L (flight controls), Z (fire cannon) and R to restart game.

Submitted to Score Space Jam 2020. Theme "Balance".

Made in pure HTML5 and Javascript.
